Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Card class for a standard card in a deck. Contains the card's rank, suit, and ImageIcon with appropriate getters, setters, toString, and comparison methods.
    Author:
    StevenCasey

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(int suit,
            int rank)
        Default Card constructor. sets the cards rank and suit from the input variables. Also derives the name of the display image to be used during games
        Parameters:
        suit - int from 0 to 3 defining the cards suit
        rank - int from 0 to 13 defining the cards rank

        public java.lang.String rankToString()
        Returns:

      • suitToString

        public java.lang.String suitToString()
        Returns:
        Card's suit as letter

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card aCard)
        Compares two cards to eachother and returns an int value of if the comparison card is greater than, less than, or equal to.
        Parameters:
        aCard - card to be compared
        Returns:
        1 for greater than, -1 for less than, and 0 for equal to
